definition: not showing human feeling or sensitivity, when followed by 'to', make numb or insensitive
details:
adjective
- not showing human feeling or sensitivity, when followed by 'to'
= example: not showing human feeling or sensitivity, when followed by 'to'
= synonyms: dead
- so frightened as to be unable to move
- lacking sensation
= synonyms: asleep
verb
- make numb or insensitive
= example: make numb or insensitive
= synonyms: dull
